product_name: National Geographic Kids Ultimate Road Atlas
long_description: This National Geographic. Author: Crispin Boyer. Softcover; 128 pages; color photographs and maps. National Geographic Society; copyright 2012. Designed to engage young minds with text and photographs that jump right off the page, this atlas offers detailed information in a fun and friendly format. National Geographic.
short_description: This National Geographic Kids Ultimate U.S. Road Trip Atlas offers fun suggestions to keep kids entertained and learning while you drive.
